title: Remeber your manners
body: Things can get heated especially over disagreements. We can all get along if we take the time to try and understand each other. Try to think about being in another person's shoes, how would you want to be treated, and what you are about to say.

Still, this... It feels passive aggressive.

Likely because passive aggressiveness is expected most of the time. I assure you that this is no troll or irony, only spreading some advice that someone might take away while browsing. Sometimes it is good to take a step back and collect yourself when spending any amount of time on a public forum.
